text: I've never had poutine before, so I have no reference point, but this was good. I don't speak any French, but they were still nice to me. I highly recommend.
Nourriture médiocre à prix élevé! À ne pas y aller! On croirait que le hamburger serait sortie d'une can!
La meilleure poutine de la région s'y trouve ici! :D
